'The University of Nottingham', otherwise known as 'Nottingham University', is a
public research university based in Nottingham, England. It was founded as
'University College Nottingham' in 1881 and granted a Royal Charter in 1948.

Nottingham's main campus, University Park, is situated on the outskirts of the
City of Nottingham, with a number of smaller campuses and a teaching hospital
(Queen's Medical Centre) located elsewhere in Nottinghamshire. Outside the
United Kingdom, Nottingham has campuses in Semenyih, Malaysia and Ningbo, China.
Nottingham is organised into five constituent faculties, within which there are
more than 50 departments, institutes and research centres. Nottingham has around
34,000 students and 9,000 staff and had a total income of Â£520 million in
2012/13, of which Â£100 million was from research grants and contracts.

The university is currently ranked 86th in the world by the Academic Ranking of
World Universities, 120th by the Times Higher Education world university rankings http://www.timeshighereducation.co.uk/world-university-
rankings/2012-13/world-ranking and 72nd in the world by the QS World
University Rankings. The university is
targeted by the second largest number of employers in the UK. [http://www.telegraph.co.uk/education/universityeducation/student-
life/9796679/Warwick-University-top-target-for-graduate-employers.html Warwick
University 'top target' for graduate employers]. Telegraph. Retrieved on 2013-07-
17. Nottingham is ranked 13th in the world in terms of the number of
alumni listed among CEOs of the Fortune Global 500.
It is also ranked 2nd (joint with Oxford) in the 2012 Summer Olympics table of
British medal winners. In 2011, Nottingham was the world's most sustainable campus in the
2011 GreenMetric World University rankings.

The university names literary legend DH Lawrence as one of its many
distinguished alumni. It is a member of
the Association of Commonwealth Universities, the Virgo Consortium, the European
University Association, the Russell Group, Universities UK, Universitas 21 and
participates in the Sutton Trust Summer School programme.
